import Typewriter from 'typewriter-effect'; import FinishedProjects from './FinishedProjects.js' import { useRef } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function MainPage() { const finishedProjects = useRef(null) const fpScroll = () => { finishedProjects.current?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); }; return ( <>
Adrian Dorado || Full-Stack Software Engineer
    • {/*
    */}

    Welcome!

    { typewriter .typeString('My name is Adrian Dorado, avid doer of things.') .pauseFor(1000) .deleteAll() .typeString('Contact me @ doradocoding@gmail.com') .pauseFor(1000) .deleteAll() .typeString('Contact me @ doradocoding@gmail.com') .pauseFor(1000) .deleteAll() .typeString('I hope you enjoy your stay <3') .start() }} />
    ); }
